notes_translated.fr: Cheminement des demandes de licences de mise en marché des produits de santé naturels utilisés comme remèdes traditionnels
notes_translated.en: This guidance document provides information to help product licence applicants determine the evidence (type and amount of data) to be provided to support the safety (risk) and efficacy (benefit) of traditional medicines.
